item.title: Symfony 3:[Twig]: Reference
item.description: Template file name [template_name].html.twig {# comment #} Template block {% block [block_name] %} [block_content] {% endblock %} Extending twig template {% extends [template_name] %} Output a variable {{ [variable_name] }} For loop {% for post in posts %} {{ post.title }}:&nbsp;{{ post.text }} {% endfor %} Generate URL from annotated route name {{ path([route_name]) }} Twig Filters # Uppercase conversion: {{ post.title|upper }} # Date conversion: {{ post.data|date('H:i:s') }} Environment variables
